comment: (about 13 ounces tender Asian greens such as bok choi baby bok choi baby Shanghai choi choi sum baby kai lan water spinach
input: 1 medium-size bunch (about 13 ounces) tender Asian greens, such as bok choi, baby bok choi, baby Shanghai choi, choi sum, baby kai lan, or water spinach

display: 4clovesgarlic,peeled,bruised until juicy with a flat side of knife,and coarsely chopped into3or4 chunks
comment: peeled bruised until juicy with a flat side of knife and coarsely chopped into 4 chunks
name: garlic
input: 4 cloves garlic, peeled, bruised until juicy with a flat side of knife, and coarsely chopped into 3 or 4 chunks

display: 1to2fresh red Holland chilesorother hot fresh red long chiles,such as Fresnoorcayenne,stemmed and sliced on the diagonal into thin pieces ( optional,but the chiles add appealing color and gentle heat; see Cook's Note,below)
comment: other hot fresh red long chiles such as Fresno cayenne stemmed and sliced on the diagonal into thin pieces (optional but the chiles add appealing color and gentle heat; see Cook's Note below
name: fresh red Holland chiles
input: 1 to 2 fresh red Holland chiles or other hot fresh red long chiles, such as Fresno or cayenne, stemmed and sliced on the diagonal into thin pieces (optional, but the chiles add appealing color and gentle heat; see Cook's Note, below)
